    • Constructor Detail

      • DDArrayAccessInfo

        public DDArrayAccessInfo(ArrayAccess expr,
                 int type,
                 Loop loop,
                 Statement stmt)
        Constructs a new array access information for the specified array access, access type, enclosing loop, and enclosing statement.
        Parameters:
        expr - the array access expression.
        type - the type of array access (0=write, 1=read).
        loop - the enclosing loop.
        stmt - the enclosing statement.
